values: A person’s posture is the manner in which they stand or sit.
Your back will feel better if you improve your posture.
n. the attitude a person or group has toward a subject 态度
v. to assume an artificial or pretended attitude 摆姿态
n. 姿势；态度；情形

- n. 姿势；情形；态度
- vi. 摆姿势
- vt. 作…的姿势


时 态:  
postured, posturing, postures 

形容词:  
postural

- n. 姿势；情形；态度
- vi. 摆姿势
